welcomePopup.message1: Welcome to Gracely, where you're only slightly punished.
welcomePopup.message2: Every character is given four seconds of grace period to fix typos until it is permanent.
welcomePopup.message3: Gracely only stores 1 cookie. Your own writing to your own browser.
welcomePopup.message4: In the top-right menu, you can find more functions.
